src_original: ṣaḍ āyatanāni saṃkleśasya hetuḥ /  ṣaḍ anusmṛtayo vyavadānasya hetuḥ /  saptāsaddharmāḥ saṃkleśasya hetuḥ /  sapta bodhyaṅgāni vyavadānasya hetuḥ /
yaś cādhyātmopaśamaḥ sa praśamaḥ /  yaḥ praśamaḥ sā prakṛtiḥ /
yaś cānilayaḥ tat kham /  khaṃ cākāśam /
sa ākāśasamān sarvadharmān prajānāti,  saṃkleśavyavadānena ca vyavaharati,
